content:
You decide to follow the path that leads to the hidden caves. As you walk, you can see the hidden caves in the distance, they are mysterious and intriguing. The hidden caves represent the glory that is required to overcome any obstacles that block your self-expression.

As you reach the entrance of the hidden caves, you see a group of people preparing to explore the caves. They invite you to join them on their exploration.

Do you:

1. Join them and explore the caves
2. Ask them for guidance
3. Continue exploring the hidden caves
4. Leave the hidden caves

Please select one of the above options by typing the corresponding number.
